code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import Header from'./Header';import{BG_IMAGE}from'../services/urlsservice';import Footer from'./Footer';import{getAuth,onAuthStateChanged}from"firebase/auth";import app from'../utils/firebase';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{addUser,removeUser}from'../utils/store/userSlice';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginPage=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const auth=getAuth(app);const unsubscribe=onAuthStateChanged(auth,user=>{if(user){const{uid,email,displayName}=user;dispatch(addUser({uid:uid,email:email,name:displayName}));navigate('/browser');}else{dispatch(removeUser());navigate('/');}});return()=>unsubscribe();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"min-h-screen",src:BG_IMAGE})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});};export default LoginPage;
